amendment.description: To require aliens seeking adjustment of status under section 245B of the Immigration and Nationality Act or Deferred Mandatory Departure status under section 245C of such Act to pay a supplemental application fee, which shall be used to provide financial assistance to States for health and educational services for noncitizens.

action.text: Amendment SA 4038, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4038 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 64 - 32. Record Vote Number: 134.

action.text: Amendment SA 4038 proposed by Senator Cornyn. (consideration: CR S4772-4774, S4775-4776; text: CR S4772-4773) To require aliens seeking adjustment of status under section 245B of the Immigration and Nationality Act or Deferred Mandatory Departure status under section 245C of such Act to pay a supplemental application fee, which shall be used to provide financial assistance to States for health and educational services for noncitizens.
